definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: "I've lost her, " said the Prince, and he returned sadly to the palace.
sentences.chinese: “我把她给追丢了，”王子伤心地回了王宫。

sentences.english: The second place we visited was Monaco Ville with the palace.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观的第二个地方是王宫的所在地摩纳哥维尔。

sentences.english: therefore it shall be, that what thing soever thou shalt hear out of the king's house, thou shalt tell it to Zadok and Abiathar the priests.
sentences.chinese: 你在王宫里听见什么，就要告诉祭司撒督和亚比亚他。

sentences.english: Death reaches everywhere, does not fear royal palaces.
There was cavalry on the Place du Palais-Royal.
Cuzco, the royal palace with large gold and silver, it is very spectacular temple of the sun.
sentences.chinese: 库斯科的王宫拥有大量金银，它的太阳神庙非常壮观。

sentences.english: The old mother tied the queen's child onto her back, and the poor woman went away with weeping eyes.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的妇人把孩子背到背上，含泪离开了王宫。

sentences.english: The king's court was full of nobles and grand ladies.
sentences.chinese: 王宫里到处都是贵族和贵夫人。

sentences.english: And the city was quiet, because Athaliah had been slain with the sword at the palace.
sentences.chinese: 众人已将亚他利雅在王宫那里用刀杀了。

sentences.english: The royal standard flies when the Queen is in residence.
sentences.chinese: 女王的王宫及驻跸处均有王旗为识。

sentences.english: Yalom suffered werewolf kill, came to the palace to her sister has left here.
sentences.chinese: 亚隆遭遇狼人追杀，前来王宫劝姐姐妲已离开此地。

sentences.english: There is a big bird which has lived in the palace for three years.
sentences.chinese: 齐国有一只大鸟，栖在王宫的庭院里依然整整三年了。

sentences.english: The royal standard flies when the queen is in residence .
sentences.chinese: 女王的王宫及居住处均有王旗为识。

sentences.english: The palace was girdled around with tall trees.
sentences.chinese: 高大的树木环抱著王宫。

sentences.english: No, those who wear fine clothes are in kings' palaces.
sentences.chinese: 那穿细软衣服的人，是在王宫里。

definition: Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center
main hall of a Buddhist temple
